name: 2021 4th International Conference on Blockchain Technology and Applications
content: Publicationï¼š All papers of ICBTA2021 will be published in the International Conference Proceedings Seriesby ACM (ISBN: 978-1-4503-8746-0). All papers will be archived in the ACM Digital Library, and submitted to Ei Compendex and Scopus for index and submitted to be reviewed by Thomson Reuters Conference Proceedings Citation Index (ISI Web of Science).
